name: wrenchly
description: Frontend: React e TailwindCSS (Daniel, Pablo e Rui) Backend: Django (Ant√≥nio e Guilherme) Database: Firebase e/ou Supabase

scripts.backend: cd backend && uv run manage.py runserver 8001
scripts.dep: uv sync && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.mig: cd backend && uv run manage.py makemigrations && uv run manage.py migrate
scripts.shell: cd backend && uv run manage.py shell
